Name: Incandescence
Description: Weapon's final ATK increases by 15% at the start of battle. No duration limit.

Name: Dead Line Timing
Description: Gains 2 extra random Signal Orbs when deployed, and 3 Signal Orbs of the same color every 45s (also gains Signal Orbs on standby).

Name: Matrix Lightning
Description: Movement Speed greatly increases and all enemies' Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 10% in Matrix.

Name: Shock Saturation
Description: Gains 2s of Invincible time when attacked, CD for 15s.

Name: Nsec Transmission
Description: Max dodge increases by 400.

Name: Shock Echo
Description: When taking damage, releases a shockwave that deals damage equal to 50% of own ATK, pushing enemies away and reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 35% for 5s, CD for 8s.

Name: Matrix Outburst
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% in Matrix.

Name: Overload Signal
Description: An Entrance Skill grants 1 additional Signal Orb. Extra DMG Bonus of Signal Orb Skills increases by 10% for 8s.

Name: Limit Break
Description: Full ATK increases by 10%.

Name: Shock Saturation
Description: Gains 2s of Invincible time when attacked, CD for 15s.

Name: Nsec Transmission
Description: Max dodge increases by 400.

Name: Shock Echo
Description: When taking damage, releases a shockwave that deals damage equal to 50% of own ATK, pushing enemies away and reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 35% for 5s, CD for 8s.

Name: Glorious Afterglow
Description: Final ATK of the weapon increases by 30% for 8s upon a 3-ping. Duration resets upon a repeated trigger.

Name: Glorious Spear
Description: When using a healing skill or effect, increases Full ATK of the healed target by 10% for 8s, CD for 10s.

Name: Superconducting Axial Ray
Description: Increases Full ATK of all characters of the team by 8%. This effect does not stack.

Name: Honed Gel
Description: Increases the healing amount of the next healing effect by 50%, CD for 8s.

Name: Stellar Magnetic Rail
Description: On QTE, restores dodge gauge by 400 for the Construct in control.

Name: Peaceful Radiant
Description: When using a healing skill or effect, increases the healing effect by 30% for 5s, CD for 8s.

Name: Resonant Echo
Description: The duration of effect inflicted by Tank class skill increases to 8s. Repeated triggering refreshes the duration.

Name: Polymerization Collapse
Description: Inflicts <color=#FF6347>Smash</color> effect upon dealing Physical DMG. <color=#FF6347>Smash</color>: reduces the target's Physical Resistance by 8% for 8s. Repeated triggering refreshes the duration.

Name: Diode Torch
Description: Inflicts <color=#FF6347>Embers</color> effect upon dealing Fire DMG. <color=#FF6347>Embers</color>: reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 8% for 8s. Repeated triggering refreshes the duration.

Name: Bose Hyperflow
Description: Inflicts <color=#FF6347>Chilly</color> effect upon dealing Ice DMG. <color=#FF6347>Chilly</color>: reduces the target's Ice Resistance by 8% for 8s. Repeated triggering refreshes the duration.

Name: Thunder Shake
Description: Inflicts <color=#FF6347>Thunder</color> effect upon dealing Lightning DMG. <color=#FF6347>Thunder</color>: reduces the target's Lightning Resistance by 8% for 8s. Repeated triggering refreshes the duration.

Name: Tenebrion Shock
Description: Inflicts <color=#FF6347>Dark Wave</color> effect upon dealing Dark DMG. <color=#FF6347>Dark Wave</color>: reduces the target's Dark Resistance by 8% for 8s. Repeated triggering refreshes the duration.

Name: Boundary's Annihilation
Description: On QTE, shields the Construct in control for 10% of the skill user's max HP for 5s.

Name: Gravity Barrier
Description: Gains a shield equal to 20% of own max HP upon deployment.

Name: Absolute Defense
Description: Becomes Invincible for 2s upon deployment.

Name: Shock Saturation
Description: Gains 2s of Invincible time when attacked, CD for 15s.

Name: Nsec Transmission
Description: Max dodge increases by 400.

Name: Shock Echo
Description: When taking damage, releases a shockwave that deals damage equal to 50% of own ATK, pushing enemies away and reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 35% for 5s, CD for 8s.

Name: Resonance Vibration
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15% when combo is greater than 50.

Name: Saturated Loading
Description: Pinging all 3 types of Signal Orbs within 5s increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Dodge Echo
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Predator's Maxim
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20% when attacking enemies in a burning area.

Name: Cycle of Stars
Description: Increases Skill - Space Lord's Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Physical DMG is increased by 15% for 5s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Measurement Theory
Description: When picking up an Energy Ball, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. For every 5 Energy Balls picked up, gains an additional random Signal Orb and 10 Energy. 10s cooldown.

Name: Unbranded Slash
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of Red Orb skills increases by 15%.

Name: Phantom Sword
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to call down a lightning strike that deals 50% Physical DMG. 3s cooldown.

Name: One With Armor
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Blade of Fury
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Physical DMG increases by 5% for 2s after each Basic Attack. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Inverse Shadow
Description: Lightning DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 4s when dealing Lightning DMG. Can be stacked up to 4 times. Signature Move increases own Extra DMG Bonus by 10% for 10s. Both duration will reset every time it is triggered.

Name: Energy Incarnate
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5%. Pinging orbs will accumulate energy based on the number of orbs pinged. Consumes 50 energy to summon Sirius for 45s. 60s cooldown.

Name: Falling Blossoms
Description: Each Ping increases Physical DMG by 2% for 5s, stacking up to a max of 10 times and repeated trigger refreshes duration. One Sword Orb can be additionally obtained when entering Sword State. 10s cooldown.

Name: Crimson Snow
Description: Ice DMG increases by 15%. All DMG increases by 10% for 5s after a 3-Ping.

Name: Bramble Heart
Description: Dark DMG increases by 15%. Attacks have a 15% chance to unleash a shadow wave, dealing 75% Dark DMG. 0.5s cooldown.

Name: Deep Pursuit
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Chain Combo
Description: Gains 1 random Signal Orb every 30 combos. 8s cooldown.

Name: Jet Boost
Description: ATK increased by 20% for 4s after an EX Dodge. Gain 1 Signal Orb when the effect ends.

Name: Original Number
Description: Laser Shot's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 50%. Gains 15% ATK after a 3-Ping for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Ring of Praise
Description: For every 12 orbs pinged, increases Extra DMG Bonus of the allies within 5m by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. When attacking Imprisoned enemies, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Storm Hunt
Description: Basic Attacks have a 10% chance to inflict Frail, reducing the target's ATK by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Attacking a Frail enemy has a 10% chance to restore 1 Signal Orb. 6s cooldown.

Name: Concentrated Neutralization
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15% if you attack the same target for 5s.

Name: Sharpshooter
Description: CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG increased by 10% if there are no enemies within 2m.

Name: New Moon
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Now, I Am the Master
Description: Signature Move's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. Signature Move reduces its target's Physical Resistance by 2% for 5s per hit. Can be stacked up to 8 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Raging Tempest
Description: Lightning DMG is increased by 15%. When dealing Lightning DMG caused by skills to the same target 5 times, calls down a lightning strike that deals 150% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown.

Name: Shed Excess
Description: Physical DMG increased by 10% for 3s when switching targets.

Name: Echo Halls
Description: Attacks have a 30% chance to inflict Broken Armor, reducing an enemy's DEF by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Chain of Stars
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Fusion Shadow
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to inflict Breach, dealing 2% Physical DMG per second for 3s. The chance is doubled if the enemy's DEF has been reduced. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Physical DMG increases by 10% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Name: Fire Chain
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to reduce the target's Fire Resistance by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown against the same target. A Signature Move increases Fire DMG by 20% and doubles the chance of reducing the target's Resistance.

Name: Precision Suppression
Description: The first Basic Attack hit on a target is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. 15s cooldown against the same target.

Name: Variable Arms
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to unleash a shockwave, dealing 100% Physical DMG to enemies in the area.

Name: One With Armor
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Merry Christmas!
Description: 3-Ping skills create a Christmas aura that increases the Movement Speed and ATK by 8% for 15s. 30s cooldown.

Name: Unified Will
Description: Physical DMG increases by 15%. Upon a successful parry, Extra DMG Bonus of the next skill increases by 30%.

Name: Shadow Burst
Description: After a 3-Ping, Physical DMG and Dark DMG dealt increase by 20% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Broken Helix
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Unquenchable
Description: ATK increases by 12% for 4s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Light Firecrackers
Description: When Artillery Tactics or Thermal Armament is active, dealing damage causes a firecracker explosion at the target location, inflicting a total of 250% Physical DMG. 10s cooldown.

Name: Chaos Particle
Description: Physical DMG increases by 10%. After a 3-Ping, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Raging Red
Description: Fire DMG increases by 10%. Pinging Red Orbs increases Fire DMG by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Silent Hunter
Description: Movement Speed is increased by 30% and ATK is increased by 10% for 3s after a 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Heart of Gravel
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% for 5s after performing a 3-Ping consecutively. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Fallen Yuanxiao
Description: Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to release a Yuanxiao that deals 15% Physical DMG. 1s cooldown.

Name: Zero Pierce
Description: Dealing a Critical Hit from behind inflicts Breach, dealing 50% Physical DMG per second for 3s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Physical DMG increases by 20% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Name: Soul Strike
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Dark DMG increases by 10% while under Cosmic Wave state.

Name: Color of Bleakness
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 7% when attacking enemies with Super Armor.

Name: Line Drawing
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% for 4s when performing a QTE or 3-Ping skill. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Color Splash
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% for 5s when dealing DMG to enemies with Super Armor. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Stuns an enemy for 2s when breaking its Super Armor. 10s cooldown for the same target. Physical DMG increases by 15% for 7s when releasing Vector Cube. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: St. Elmo's Fire
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 10%. No. of Lightning Strikes required to trigger Core Passive reduced to 3 under "Signature - Lightning Charge".

Name: White Sculpture
Description: <color=#FF6347>Bitter Frost</color> deals 20% more Base DMG. <color=#FF6347>Bitterfrost Level's</color> Energy acquisition speed increases by 100%.

Name: Photophage Phantom
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Rageful Abyss
Description: After a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 12% for 4s.

Name: Solar Cleave
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. When Camu: Crocotta enters Berserk, Thanatos will continuously increase Dark DMG for characters on the battlefield by 10%.

Name: Split Road
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Collapsing Edge
Description: Increases ATK by 10% for 3s after casting small/medium/wide-area electromagnetic beam. The duration is refreshed each time this effect is triggered.

Name: Unnamed
Description: Unnamed

Name: Everlasting Brilliance
Description: Damaging a target will reduce their Physical DEF by 20% for 8s. The duration is refreshed each time this effect is triggered. Dealing damage with small/medium/wide-area electromagnetic beam also applies a damage over time effect for 8s, dealing Physical DMG equal to 25%/50%/100% of ATK every second.

Name: Unnamed
Description: Unnamed

Name: Split Road
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Contract
Description: Physical DMG in <color=#FF6347>Battle Stance</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>10%</color>.

Name: Contract
Description: Physical DMG in <color=#FF6347>Battle Stance</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>10%</color>.

Name: Contract - Mod
Description: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#FF6347>15%</color> and doubles the effects of Leader Skill. Upon entering combat, gains <color=#FF6347>160</color> <color=#FF6347>Stability</color> and switching to <color=#FF6347>Battle Stance</color> gives <color=#FF6347>2</color> stacks of <color=#FF6347>Data Correction</color>.

Name: Contract - Mod
Description: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#FF6347>15%</color> and doubles the effects of Leader Skill. Upon entering combat, gains <color=#FF6347>160</color> <color=#FF6347>Stability</color> and switching to <color=#FF6347>Battle Stance</color> gives <color=#FF6347>2</color> stacks of <color=#FF6347>Data Correction</color>.

Name: Transcendence
Description: Physical DMG increases by 10% for 5s upon entering Matrix.

Name: Cleansing
Description: After casting a Blue Orb skill, Physical DMG increases by 10% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Marvel
Description: When equipped by Qu: Pavo, increases her Physical DMG by <color=#FF6347>20%</color> and Huiyu's attack frequency by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>. Huiyu gains a new skill: Curse Incarnate. <color=#FF6347>Curse Incarnate</color>: Huiyu becomes a curse attached to the target, dealing Physical DMG, then explodes after a short while to deal Physical DMG. The DMG varies based on Qu's Signature Move level.

Name: Star-Piercing Punch
Description: After an Entrance Skill, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 8s.

Name: Formless Palm
Description: After a dodge, Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 8% for 4s.

Name: Eight Pinnacles
Description: Ice DMG increases by 15%. Creates Mirror Crystals for 8s after casting Flowing Whirlpool or QTE skill.

Name: Rebel
Description: Upon deploying <color=#FF6347>POD: Shield</color>, A2 gains a 10% Physical DMG boost. Slide for 1s to increase the boost from <color=#FF6347>POD: Shield</color> by an extra 5%.

Name: Rebel - Mod
Description: While A2 is in <color=#FF6347>Berserk Mode</color>, she gains <color=#FF6347>10%</color> Extra DMG Bonus. Within <color=#FF6347>2</color>s after entering Matrix or dodging, hold the Attack button to launch an enhanced attack dealing * Physical DMG. If this attack hits the enemy, press the Attack button again to launch a follow-up attack, dealing * Physical DMG (DMG varies depending on the Basic Attack level). Press charge to <color=#FF6347>consume all Yellow Orbs</color> to charge up Type-4O Lance, with each Yellow Orb consumed providing <color=#FF6347>3%</color> POD: Shield. Additionally, whenever Yellow Orbs of any number are consumed, A2 gains <color=#FF6347>10%</color> Extra Physical DMG Bonus for 15s.

Name: Oath
Description: DMG for <color=#FF6347>Overclock Indicator</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>10%</color>.

Name: Oath - Mod
Description: Increases Physical DMG and Healing effects by <color=#FF6347>15%</color>, also doubles the effects of Leader Skill. After triggering <color=#FF6347>Overclock Indicator</color>, swapping cooldown for 2B and A2 decreases by <color=#FF6347>1s</color> and they gain 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Eternal Starting
Description: Impending Pain's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Lunar Eclipse
Description: Full DMG increases by 15% for 8s if 3 signal orbs in different colors are pinged in 6s.

Name: Eridani Perturbation
Description: The dark DMG increases by 15%, and the 4th spine of annihilation orb will produce additional 100% of ranged dark DMG.

Name: Heavy Barrel
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Frost Spin</color> increases by 10%.

Name: Second Explosion
Description: Ice DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Judgement
Description: Ice DMG increases by 15%. Gain <color=#FF6347>Frost Crystal</color> for 8s when the backstep of <color=#FF6347>Blooming Shot</color> successfully dodges an attack.

Name: Prologue
Description: Attack increases by 8%. After dodging an attack, movement speed increases by 8% for 4s.

Name: Swan Lake
Description: After a 3-Ping, ATK increases by 3% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Serenade
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 20%. <color=#FF6347>Roaring Thunder</color> and <color=#FF6347>Sonic Vortex</color> can now be cast during the action of other Signal Orb skills, but cannot be cast consecutively. Leaving Chaotic M.I.N.D. will return Orbs based on the number of Orbs before entering Chaotic M.I.N.D. and rearrange them for 3-Ping.

Name: Ice Modification
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Glacial Slash</color> increases by 15%.

Name: Efficient Conversion
Description: All DMG increases by 5% after 3-Ping for 5s.

Name: Apollo's Glory
Description: Ice DMG increases by 15%, QTE and any 3-Ping skill can trigger <color=#FF6347>Frost Corrosion</color>.

Name: Magnetic Wave Field
Description: Temporary Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks, the Co-Bot unleashes a <color=#FF6347>Force Wave</color> that deals <color=#FF6347>50%</color> AOE Dark DMG to enemies (only triggers once per second).

Name: Memories Resonance
Description: Experimental Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks or disrupts incoming enemy attacks, the Co-Bot unleashes a <color=#FF6347>Force Wave</color> that deals <color=#FF6347>50%</color> AOE Dark DMG to enemies (only triggers once per second). This effect can only be triggered once per second. Inver-Resonance Unit: Increases the Extra DMG Bonus of No.21: XXI's Twilight Matrix and <color=#FF6347>Resonance Pulse</color> by <color=#FF6347>10%</color>.

Name: Wide Energy Pressure
Description: When equipped by No. 21: XXI, she gains Wide-Energy Pressure Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks, a QTE, or recovers from hit, the Co-Bot unleashes a <color=#FF6347>Force Wave</color> that deals <color=#FF6347>50%</color> AOE Dark DMG to enemies within (this effect can only be triggered once per second). Energy Suppression Unit: Hitting allies with Force Wave will grant them <color=#FF6347>Energy Suppression</color> for 3s. Energy Suppression: Dealing Dark DMG reduces the enemy's healing received by <color=#FF6347>100%</color> for 3s. Impulse Fort Module: When the Force Wave detonates <color=#FF6347>6</color> Twilight Matrices at once, the Co-Bot enters Fortification mode, unleashing a hyper-pulse that deals Dark DMG equal to * of No. 21: XXI's ATK (DMG scales with Core Passive level). Inver-Resonance Unit 2.0: Increases the Extra DMG Bonus of No. 21: XXI's Twilight Matrix and <color=#FF6347>Resonance Pulse</color> by <color=#FF6347>15%</color>.

Name: Sharp Cut
Description: DMG from Red Orbs <color=#FF6347>Reaper Sweep</color> increases by 10%

Name: Forged with Lightning
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 10%

Name: Eternal Hymn
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 15%. <color=#FF6347>Victorious War Flag</color> and Signature Move <color=#FF6347>Shining Piercer</color> can create another stack of <color=#FF6347>Electric Charge</color>. When <color=#FF6347>Victorious War Flag</color> is on the field, deploying Vera: Garnet will consume all of <color=#FF6347>Electric Charge</color> to cast <color=#FF6347>Lightning Fall</color>. Create another stack of <color=#FF6347>Electric Charge</color> afterward.

Name: Pioneer Blade
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Opening Fireworks
Description: After casting valid combo twice within 6s, all damage increases by 10% for 5s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Immortality
Description: Fire DMG increases by 10%. The cooldown between consecutive dodging is removed. After dodging a damage, accumulates 1 Combo 2 - Dazzling Blade, which can be cast directly toward the direction of the joystick by tapping the White Orb. Also increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10% for 8s. During <color=#FF6347>Apex of Trickery</color>, the Deception Points generated from this combo are converted into 10 <color=#FF6347>Trickery Points</color> instead.

Name: Mediation Melody
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of pings increases by <color=#FF6347>10%</color>.

Name: Faithful Oath
Description: Upon making a Prayer, gains <color=#FF6347>15%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for <color=#FF6347>10</color>s.

Name: Sacred Flame Ripples
Description: Liv: Empyrea gains <color=#FF6347>10%</color> more ATK. Every time she enters the battlefield, she gains <color=#FF6347>50%</color> Prayer. Fire DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Purity Oath</color> against enemies affected by <color=#FF6347>White Oracle</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>20%</color> (up to <color=#FF6347>100%</color>).

Name: Minuet Variation
Description: <color=#FF6347>Red Orbs</color> deal 15% more damage.

Name: Dark Spring Solo
Description: Dark DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Mirage Light Concerto
Description: Each phantom unleashed by Selena: Capriccio on the field will make Selena: Capriccio deal 5% more Extra DMG. This effect can be stacked up to 6 times. Upon casting a <color=#FF6347>Reprise: Echo</color>, Selena: Capriccio gains 12 additional Signature Energy.

Name: Change of Stars
Description: DMG Bonus increases by 10% upon the activation of Dragon Axe.

Name: Falling Moon
Description: The Base DMG of <color=#FF6347>Signature - Spirit Blade Dance</color> increases by 20%.

Name: Dragon Boost
Description: Increases Physical DMG dealt by 15% and Base DMG of <color=#FF6347>Signature - Spirit Blade Dance</color> by 25%. CRIT Rate of <color=#FF6347>Spirit Blade: Falling Stars</color> increases by 30% for every <color=#FF6347>Dragon Force Combo</color> cast. (Can be stacked up to 2 times)

Name: Overload Muzzle
Description: Fire DMG increases by 5%. <color=#FF6347>"Perfect!"</color> deals 10% more damage.

Name: Star Burst
Description: Increases Fire DMG by 10%.

Name: Helium Flash
Description: Fire DMG increases by 15%. When Nanami: Starfarer is on standby, her teammates' every 3-Ping will restore 12 Signature Energy for her. Missiles will inflict <color=#FF6347>Scorching Invasion</color> upon hitting the target: reduces 15% Fire Resistance for 8s. When Nanami: Starfarer triggers the QTE, if there is <color=#FF6347>Missile Support</color> on the field, the duration of <color=#FF6347>Missile Support</color> will be refreshed.

Name: Test Circuit
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of Radiant Whirlwind Increases by 10%.

Name: Darkstar Convergence
Description: Increases Dark DMG by 10%.

Name: Big Bang
Description: The <color=#FF6347>Chain Fusion</color> effect applied by Karenina: Scire increases by <color=#FF6347>10%</color>. Each time Karenina casts <color=#FF6347>Radiant Whirlwind</color>, she recovers <color=#FF6347>1</color> Energy. The Extra DMG Bonus of Leap Attack increases by <color=#FF6347>20%</color>.

Name: Reinforcement Level +15
Description: DMG Bonus of Basic Attack increases by 15%.

Name: Energy Berserk
Description: DMG from pinging Signal Orbs increases by 20%.

Name: The Liberated Avalon
Description: ATK increases by 10%. Triggering Gear-Break Combo or Assault-Rising Combo restores 10 Signature Energy. Dodge Gauge restores 100% faster.

Name: Sharp Blade
Description: Increases CRIT DMG by 10%.

Name: Candlelight
Description: ATK increases by 5%. CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Deep Scar
Description: CRIT DMG increases by 30%. Upon entering the <color=#FF6347>Sword Form</color>, immediately gains 20 stacks of <color=#FF6347>Stigmata Will</color> and activates the <color=#FF6347>Resolution</color> status.

Name: Overlaid Bladedge
Description: ATK increases by 5%.

Name: Chilling Evisceration
Description: Ice DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Stark Perseverance
Description: ATK increases by 10%. Bambinata: Vitrum's <color=#FF6347>Pas De Chat</color> deals 15% more Ice DMG. Every time Bambinata: Vitrum is deployed, she will forget a random color of Signal Orbs for 1 <color=#FF6347>Pact of Memory</color>.

Name: Kinetic Bonus
Description: Fire DMG increases by 5%.

Name: Critical Fusion
Description: Fire DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Reverse Dimension
Description: ATK increases by 10%. Casting <color=#FF6347>Realm Travel</color> will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown. The first <color=#FF6347>Hypermatrix Strike</color> launched upon entering battle will generate 1 extra <color=#FF6347>Sight Point</color>.

Name: Heart of Kaleidoscope
Description: ATK increases by 5%.

Name: Parhelion Halo
Description: Ice DMG increases by 10%.

Name: All of Nature
Description: ATK increases by 10%. Doubles the Base DMG increase effect of Ayla: Kaleido's <color=#FF6347>Vibrant Brushstroke</color> for <color=#FF6347>Signature - Finishing Touch</color>. The Ice DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Frost Crystal</color> increases to 20%.

Name: Bladevore
Description: ATK increases by 5%.

Name: Thundict
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Shadebloom
Description: Increases ATK by 10%. When Alpha: Crimson Weave <color=#FF6347>holds an odachi</color>, her Extra DMG Bonus is increased by 15%. The efficiency of acquiring <color=#FF6347>Lightless</color> is increased by 40%.
